intents.prompt: Abandon the MCP server entirely and create a setup script that writes/edits cursorrules and Claude instruction files
intents.summary: Created setup-intention.js that detects AI assistants and adds intent tracking instructions to their config files - supports Cursor, Claude, Copilot, Aider, and Continue

intents.prompt: Add support for Claude Code CLI which uses .claude-project.yaml files
intents.summary: Added Claude Code CLI configuration to AI_CONFIGS array with proper YAML format for .claude-project.yaml files, updated documentation to reflect both Claude Desktop and Claude Code CLI support
